infos.value: And where might you being going in such a rush?
Just what I'd expect from King Khury.
Somewhere you'd rather the head of this castle did not know?
We thought not to bother you with our farewells at this late an hour.
And what are we to make of you loosing arrows upon us?
Make of it as you please.
Leave off if you want to live!
I see you must learn what befalls those who betray me.
Were not you the ones who forged an underhanded alliance with Fennes and bared your fangs at Leonis!?
Fine... Then let the victor decide who speaks the truth.
